verses.roman:
ei-mate nṛtya prabhu kailā kata-kṣaṇa
svarūpa-gosāñi prabhure karāila sāvadhāna

synonyms: ei-mate—in this way; nṛtya—dancing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā—performed; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; prabhure—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karāila—caused to do; sāvadhāna—care of other rituals.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu danced for some time, and then Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī informed Him of other rituals for the body of Ṭhākura Haridāsa.
